thread.title: Well located boutique hotel with very friendly staff
thread.title_full: Well located boutique hotel with very friendly staff - Review of Le Pradey, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ottobahn
title: Well located boutique hotel with very friendly staff
text: Super pleasant hotel with very friendly reception staff. The location could not be better, you are right at the Tuileries and the Louvre, with Rue St. Honoré, the Palais Royal, Place Vendôme all around the corner. A Metro stop (Tuileries) is within short walking distance. I had a room on the sixth floor which was, in true Parisian fashion, quite petit (but with a big comfy king-size bed). The well-appointed bathroom was of fair size, with a rain shower, a big washbasin, nicely tiled, plush towels, nice toiletries. There are no coffee or tea making facilities in the room, but there is a nice little lounge on the mezzanine floor above reception offering a Nespresso machine and also an honesty bar. Breakfast is a small, but varied buffet in the basement. English speaking reception staff are super helpful. Given what nice hotel room in the 1er normally costs, almost a bargain.
